Merant Mover Not Found

The command you selected requires a connection to an active installation of Merant Mover. If you have installed Merant Mover, please verify that you have correctly configured the connection to the Merant Mover Server before continuing. See the Merant Mover User’s Guide for more information.

What is Merant Mover?

Merant Mover is an automation tool that helps reduce errors deploying digital assets.

Based on the criteria of your choice, Merant Mover extracts files from your Merant Version Manager or Merant Dimensions projects, and deploys them to any mixture of servers. Merant Mover leverages existing development tools and processes to provide more control, flexibility and visibility when deploying changes to distributed points for testing, staging, build distribution and production roll-out.

Benefits of Merant Mover

  • Increased productivity via reduced manual effort
  • Reduced errors, rework and downtime
  • Increased control, security and flexibility

For More Information
